Description.0: 16 decks in saucer, 5 in neck and 20 in secondary hull.
Description.2: The Orion Class was one of the most numerus ships before the second generation.
Description.3: A simple destroyer with a secondary hull attached above the main saucer.
Description.4: Due to their reliablity and moderate power, many captains and admirals use them as the backbone of many a battlegroup.
